      • addMetadata

        void addMetadata(PointingMetadata newMetadata)
        The child element can have the child elements: is present in the first block of a VSTP and contains the VSTPnumber (three digits with leading zero). contains the maximum position error for this and the following blocks that do not contain an updated position error in metadata. contains the three simple child elements , and . Each element contains a list of maximum position offset along the respective direction. If the length of these lists is longer than 1 then the additional element must be provided that contains a list of times. Each time must have the format YYYYMM- DDTHH:MM:SS[.SSS]Z. The length of the lists in all elements must be the same. can be used to specify the required HGA articulation. optional element for inserting comments. the SGS may use this element to store any information If has no child elements the element may be omitted.
        Parameters:
        newMetadata -
